statements: DELETE FROM employee_skill_gap_analysis WHERE job_title = 'Manager' AND skills_needed LIKE '%Leadership%';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE skill_level > 3 AND department = 'Engineering';
DELETE FROM skills WHERE category = 'Programming' AND skill_id = 5;
DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND department = 'Sales';
DELETE FROM skills WHERE skill_category = 'Technical' AND skill_name = 'Python';
DELETE FROM EmployeeSkills WHERE employee_id = 100 AND skill_id = 1;
